## Discussion

To check whether a collection is empty, use its `isEmpty` property instead of comparing `count` to zero. Calculating `count` can be an O(*n*) operation.

# count

**Instance Property**

The number of elements.

## Declaration

```swift
var count: Int { get }
```

## Discussion

To check whether a collection is empty, use its `isEmpty` property instead of comparing `count` to zero. Calculating `count` can be an O(*n*) operation.
title: count
